item.title: Mustafa Suleyman Says Elon Musk Has 'Superhuman Capabilities,' Calls Him 'Bulldozer'
item.description: Mustafa Suleyman, CEO of Microsoft AI, praises fellow AI leaders and warns against pursuing superintelligence. read more

item.title: Kevin O'Leary Says Social Media Can Make Side Hustles Easier, Help Entrepreneurs Earn $1,000/Month
item.description: Investor Kevin O'Leary says modern technology and social media make side hustles easier and more profitable. read more

item.title: Chuck Schumer Calls Trump's Response To Rising Health Insurance Costs 'Pathetic:' 'Failed The American People'
item.description: Chuck Schumer criticizes Donald Trump for mocking Americans struggling with health costs as "just pathetic." read more

item.title: US Lifts Belarus Potash Sanctions After Lukashenko Releases 123 Political Prisoners, Including Nobel Laureate
item.description: US lifted sanctions on Belarusian potash exports after President Lukashenko released 123 political prisoners, including opposition figures. read more

item.title: Mark Cuban Warns AI Will Decide Corporate Survival, Says Companies That Fail To Master It 'Used To Be In Business'
item.description: Billionaire Mark Cuban warns AI will determine business survival. Companies must adopt AI, or they'll be left behind. read more
